## Welcome

Welcome to the CFA Data Pipelines Workshop! This course will teach you essential skills for building robust data pipelines, acquiring data from various sources, and cleaning data for analysis.

## Course Overview

In this workshop, you will learn:

- **Data Pipeline Design**: Best practices for designing and implementing data pipelines
- **Database Operations**: Querying and managing data in databases
- **API Integration**: How to acquire data from RESTful APIs
- **Data Cleaning**: Techniques for preparing and validating data for analysis

## Getting Started

- Review the [Syllabus](syllabus.qmd) for course objectives and requirements
- Access [Slides](slides/01-introduction.qmd) for lecture materials
- Explore the [Docker Example](docker-example/README.md) for a complete healthcare pipeline

## Prerequisites

Students should have:

- Basic programming knowledge (Python or R recommended)
- Familiarity with data structures (lists, dictionaries, data frames)
- Understanding of basic database concepts

## Course Materials

All course materials, including slides and example code, are available on the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/EpiForeSITE/CFA-Data-Pipelines-Workshop).
